results.title: Amour de la toilette
results.brief_description:
Subtlety is the key to this brilliantly conceived hand drawn animation that employs the simple technology of a whiteboard and markers to create an engaging evocation of Paris. The use of minimalist materials is supported by thorough planning skills, the controlled use of camera and a storyline that is achievable within the limitations of the medium.
Music by The Cafe Accordian Orchestra.

results.title: Tank wars
results.brief_description: Command your tank around the battlefield to destroy all other tanks. Four levels, working on a scoring system. Objective is to kill all enemies in the least amount of time.

results.title: Snake bite
results.brief_description: An interactive war game set in Iraq. You are a soldier and your mission is to intercept a rebel force planning an attack on Al Hilhah, south of Baghdad, and destroy this terrorist threat before they are able to kill any of the city’s civilians.
results.description: An interactive war game set in Iraq. You are a soldier and your mission is to intercept a rebel force planning an attack on Al Hilhah, south of Baghdad, and destroy this terrorist threat before they are able to kill any of the city’s civilians.

group.title: Top Screen 2007 VCE Media Interactive Works

results.title: Bunyip
results.brief_description: Short Flash animation based around a bunyip, an Aboriginal mythical animal, that goes on a journey into town and encounters a drunken man called Larry. Intrigued by Larry, the bunyip sets out on a quest to eat him but has to face several ordeals before finally reaching the drunken Larry.

group.title: Top Screen 2007 VCE Media Interactive Works

results.title: Basil's adventure
results.brief_description: An interactive 2-d animation based on a small boy called Basil. Using interactive elements and characters, you can help Basil to find his way home. The 7 minute animation was aimed at the young, but all ages should enjoy it. Very entertaining and quite amusing.

results.title: Love of static sound
results.brief_description: A range of visual treatments including image within image and beat mixed editing creates a seductive and culturally revealing music video clip. Two characters are depicted using a high impact visual style with an underlying narrative.

results.title: He knows some things
results.brief_description: The use of colour and fluid animation suggests the innocence and carefree nature of childhood while the accompanying voice over suggests that childhood is much more complex. The work demonstrates skilfull use of rotoscoping techniques.
